Articles.Content: I have seen several mods that add new strategies to the game such as [Strategem](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97131-0-90-Strategem-New-Strategies-for-Career-1-1) and [Serious Kerbal Business](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97334-0-25-Serious-Kerbal-Business-%28v1-0%29-New-Strategies-for-Serious-Admin). I would like to try my hand in strategy creation, but I don't know where to start. I have looked at the configuration file for SKB, but that still doesn't tell me how to use the options given and what options are available that I don't see used there. Does anyone know the entire set of options available for strategy creation, or at least have a straightforward way of explaining how the basic options work? Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks!
You might want to try the add-on forums for this question.
Ok, will do that right away. Thanks for the advice, I still get a little disoriented around here!
